name: Plan to Empower
briefDescription: ABOUT PLAN TO EMPOWERWomen and children around the world are in desperate need of financial support, social equality and political representation. Economic development has been proven to better the quality of human lives and make possible the support, equality and representation desired by women and children. The gender gap that exists in global poverty is growing rapidly.Plan to Empower is a non-profit organization created with the aim to promote child welfare and women's right. We seek to safeguard the rights of women and children through advocacy, education, and empowerment. We work to ensure that families thrive in environments that are safe, healthy, nurturing, and productive.
